definition: to incite/to prompt (sb to do sth)
finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end
to make/to cause/to enable/to use/to employ/to send/to instruct sb to do sth/envoy/messenger

sentences.english: Text analysis is the process of enabling computers to extract meaning from text.
sentences.chinese: 文本分析是指使計算機能夠從文本中提取意義的過程。

sentences.english: The one eyed Wang Huaie directs the truth of how he framed and disc for Jing kui.
sentences.chinese: 獨眼龍將王懷鍔指使他如何陷害景逵的實情和盤供出。

sentences.english: After the incident, Lee also directs others Perjury up their own misdeeds .
sentences.chinese: 事發後，李英還指使他人作僞證包庇自己的劣跡。

sentences.english: They hate to be bothered about anything except that which is to be done on their behalf by others.
sentences.chinese: 什麼事他都嫌麻煩，除了指使別人替他做的事之外。

sentences.english: Equalizing rate of return The rate of return that equalizes the present value of two streams of costs.
sentences.chinese: 平衡收益率指使兩組成本流的現值相等的收益率。

sentences.english: Its members, who numbered in the hundreds, were instructed not to vote.
sentences.chinese: 它的信衆成百上千，都被指使不參與投票選舉。

sentences.english: Do you know who was behind the killing?
sentences.chinese: 你知道是誰指使的這場殺戮麼？

sentences.english: I heard that he love to boss people around.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說他很愛指使人的。

sentences.english: He's the man behind the scenes.
My sister always bosses me around. She’s on a power trip.
sentences.chinese: 我姐姐在家裏總是指使我，完全是她掌權。

sentences.english: Recently, a factory ordered units of the security person in charge of Yang burning chemical waste.
sentences.chinese: 近日，某工廠負責人楊某指使單位保安焚燒化工垃圾。

sentences.english: After independence we would no longer be at the beck and call of the colonial master.
sentences.chinese: 獨立之後我們將不再聽候殖民宗主國的吆喝和指使。

definition: to conspire to murder/to plot against sb's life
to frame sb (by planting sth on them)
to entrap/to frame/to plant false evidence against sb
to collude with/to collaborate with/to gang up with
to entrap/to set up/to frame (up)/to make false charges against
to manipulate from behind the scenes/to pull the strings
